stepAnswer: milder form that typically does not impair social or occupational functioning to the extent that mania does and does not progress to psychosis
stepTitle: How does hypomania differ from mania?
choices: milder form that typically does not impair social or occupational functioning to the extent that mania does and does not progress to psychosis
more extreme form that typically does not impair social or occupational functioning to the extent that mania does and does not progress to psychosis
more extreme form that typically impairs social or occupational functioning to the extent that mania does and does not progress to psychosis
